thread.title: Little Kid Cries After Refs Screw Northwestern With Terrible Call
thread.title_full: Little Kid Cries After Refs Screw Northwestern With Terrible Call

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Little Kid Cries After Refs Screw Northwestern With Terrible Call
text:
At the end of today’s Northwestern-Gonzaga game, refs made an egregious call that may have helped Gonzaga eek out a win today. 
With about 4 minutes left in the game, referees missed an obvious goal-tending call on Gonzaga and then went on to call a technical on Northwesten coach Chris Collins for complaining about the call. 
All these bad calls are making this little Northwestern fan sad.

March Madness can get to anyone. pic.twitter.com/SX4E6wGyXO 
— CBS Sports (@CBSSports) March 18, 2017
